snippet: Three weeks after negotiating a deal for union pay cuts, the Metropolitan Opera is eliminating 22 of its 254 nonunion administrative jobs.
abstract: Metropolitan Opera, which promised to match pay cuts that its major unions agreed to in August with equivalent cuts to its nonunion payroll, says it is eliminating 22 of its 254 administrative positions, mostly through layoffs.
lead_paragraph: Three weeks after negotiating a deal for union pay cuts, the Metropolitan Opera is eliminating 22 of its 254 nonunion administrative jobs.

headline.main: Met Opera Cuts 22 Nonunion Jobs, Mainly Through Layoffs
headline.print_headline: Met Opera Cuts 22 Nonunion Jobs, Mainly Through Layoffs
